newsitem.title: FRANCE: Air France to maintain weekly Kuwait freight service.
newsitem.headline: Air France to maintain weekly Kuwait freight service.

text.p: Air France Cargo said it will maintain its weekly Boeing 747-200 freighter flight between Paris and Kuwait when its three times a week Airbus 310 passenger service on the route is withdrawn during the next winter season.

"The Kuwait freighter, for which there is buoyant demand, will continue as normal absorbing the small amount of capacity lost by the closure of the passenger service," an Air France Cargo official told Reuters.
Kuwait Airways has an allocation of up to 30 tonnes on Air France's Paris-Kuwait City freighter service.

The Kuwaiti carrier also runs a weekly Boeing 707 freighter service on a Frankfurt-Paris-Kuwait City routing in addition to a three times weekly Paris-Kuwait City passenger service. - Reuters Air Cargo Service Tel+ 44 171 542 7706 Fax +5017 - www.racs.com
